[heading] Job Description Job Description Report this job CA Intern

Responsibilities:

Responsible for day to day accounting of company as well as clients.
Responsible for finalization of accounts, preparation of financial statements (Monthly, Quarterly and Annually).
Manage all accounting transactions and Prepare budget forecasts.
Reconcile accounts payable and receivable, ensure timely bank payments.
Reinforce financial data confidentially and conduct database back up when necessary.
Comply with financial policies and regulations.

Requirements:

Experience in Compliance returns filling i.e. GST Returns, TDS Returns, ITR.
Experience in Cloud Accounting Software like QuickBooks, Zoho Books is a great plus.
Thorough knowledge of Direct, Indirect tax required to handle queries from respective authorities and response to the same.
Experience in accounting of business entities engaged in the sector of Service Providers, Manufacturers, Transporters, Traders etc.
Excellent communication skills.
Willing to travel outside office for accounting work.
Minimum 2 to 3 years of experience with a reputed CA firm.
Willing to work in a start-up and high paced environment.

Qualification(s): B.Com, M.Com, Inter CA

Language: English, Hindi and Gujarati

Work Location  Ahmedabad

[heading] Job Description Job Description Report this job [bold] SEO Intern SEO Intern [bold] Job Title: Job Title: SEO Intern 
 [bold] Duration: Duration: 6 months 
 [bold] Location: Location: Ahmedabad (Work from office) 
 [bold] Stipend: Stipend: Yes [bold] Position Summary Position Summary We are looking for a motivated and enthusiastic SEO Intern to join our digital marketing team. The SEO Intern will be responsible for supporting our search engine optimization efforts, enhancing the companys online presence, and helping to increase organic traffic. This is a great opportunity for someone looking to gain hands-on experience in the digital marketing industry and build their skills in SEO. [bold] Key Responsibilities Key Responsibilities Assist in conducting keyword research and identifying trends using SEO tools (e.g., Google Keyword Planner, Ahrefs, SEMrush). Optimize website content, meta tags, and descriptions to improve organic search rankings. Support the creation and execution of on-page and off-page SEO strategies. Monitor and report on website analytics using tools such as Google Analytics, Search Console, and other SEO platforms. Conduct competitor analysis and provide recommendations for improvement. Assist in link-building efforts, outreach campaigns, and content marketing strategies. Collaborate with the content team to ensure SEO best practices are incorporated into the content creation process. Stay up-to-date with the latest SEO trends, algorithm updates, and industry developments. Help with the technical audit of the website to ensure proper indexation, crawlability, and mobile optimization. Perform other related tasks as assigned by the SEO Manager. [bold] Qualifications Qualifications Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field. Basic understanding of SEO principles, keyword research, and on-page/off-page optimization. Familiarity with SEO tools like Google Analytics, Search Console, SEMrush, Ahrefs, etc., is a plus. Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and website structure is an advantage but not required. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Proactive attitude and willingness to learn in a fast-paced environment. Ability to work independently as well as part of a team. [bold] Benefits Benefits Gain hands-on experience in SEO and digital marketing. Mentorship and learning opportunities from experienced professionals. Potential for full-time employment based on performance. Certificate of completion at the end of the internship.

[heading] Job Description Job Description Report this job [bold] Job Title: Content Writer Intern Job Title: Content Writer Intern [bold] Internship Duration: Internship Duration: 6 months 
 [bold] Work from Office: Work from Office: Ahmedabad 
 [bold] Stipend: Stipend: Yes [bold] : : Are you a talented writer with a passion for creating engaging content? Do you have a good command of the English language and a knack for storytelling? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you! Join our team as a Content Writing intern at OTFCoder and unleash your creativity in a dynamic and fast-paced environment. Create high-quality written content for our website, blog, and social media platforms. Conduct research on industry-related topics to generate fresh ideas for content. Collaborate with our team to develop content strategies that align with our brand voice and objectives. Edit and proofread content to ensure accuracy, clarity, and consistency. Optimize content for SEO and implement best practices to drive organic traffic. Engage with our audience through comments, messages, and social media interactions. Stay updated on industry trends and incorporate new ideas into your writing to keep our content relevant and engaging. If you are a dedicated and creative individual looking to gain valuable experience in content writing, apply now and take your writing skills to the next level with OTFCoder!

[heading] Job Description Job Description Report this job [bold] Job Title: Reel editor Intern Job Title: Reel editor Intern [bold] Internship Duration: Internship Duration: 6 months 
 [bold] Work from Office: Work from Office: Ahmedabad 
 [bold] Stipend: Stipend: Yes [bold] Role Description Role Description We are looking for a skilled and creative Instagram Reels Video recorder as well as an Editor to join our team. You will be responsible for creating engaging and visually appealing short-form videos for our brand as well as our clients social presence. If you have a passion for video editing, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to tell stories through captivating visuals, we would love to have you on board. [bold] Responsibilities Responsibilities Have a creative eye to record videos for Fb/IG reels and YT shorts. Edit short-form videos for Instagram Reels/YouTube shorts, adhering to the brands style and guidelines. Use video editing software to trim, arrange, and enhance footage for maximum impact. Apply creative transitions, effects, and animations to enhance the visual appeal of the videos. Optimize video content for social media format, ensuring the videos are visually appealing and engaging. [bold] Content Curation: Content Curation: Select relevant video clips, images, and audio to create compelling and cohesive videos. Incorporate on-trend and popular content elements to increase engagement and reach. Collaborate with the content team to brainstorm and generate fresh ideas for Reels content. [bold] Storytelling and Narration Storytelling and Narration Understand the brands messaging and storytelling objectives to create videos that effectively communicate the desired message. Utilize video sequencing, pacing, and audio to create a cohesive narrative and capture viewers attention. Incorporate engaging captions, subtitles, or text overlays to enhance the storytelling experience. [bold] Visual and Audio Enhancement Visual and Audio Enhancement Enhance video quality by adjusting brightness, contrast, saturation, and other visual parameters. Sync appropriate background music, sound effects, or voiceovers to enhance the videos impact. Maintain a consistent visual and audio style across all videos while aligning with the brands identity. [bold] Quality Control and Optimization Quality Control and Optimization Review and proofread videos for errors, ensuring accurate captions, smooth transitions, and proper audio synchronization. Optimize video files for efficient storage and upload while maintaining high-quality standards. Stay up to date with industry trends, new editing techniques, and Instagram Reels features.
